name: RGB Battle
description:
Local multiplayer game where two colored triangles fight each other using colors. In order to score, players must hit each other using different colors.
For example, a green projectile will score only if it hits the blue or red sides of the triangle.

Controls:

Player 1:
Move Up - W | Move Down - S | Rotate Left - A | Rotate Right - D | Fire - Space

Player 2: Move Up - Up Arrow | Move Down - Down Arrow | Rotate Left - Left Arrow | Rotate Right - Right Arrow | Fire - Enter

Made for the Global Game Jam 2017.
http://globalgamejam.org/2017/games/rgb-battle

Martin Sebastian Rodriguez - Art & Code

Jesus Lautaro Careglio Albornoz - Code

Diego Perez Mortenssen - Sound
